hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/Aloa-Informatique; USER=aloa-informatique.com PASS=5tc9aTQ9 HOST=ftp.onlinux-fr.setupdns.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=2 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/public/www -X public/www/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='Aloa-Informatique' WPDBVERSION=`cat wp-includes/version.php | grep "wp_version =" | cut -d \' -f 2` WPPLUGIN=`find wp-content/plugins/ -type d -maxdepth 1 | cut -f3 -d '/'` URL='http://aloa-informatique.com/' TYPE='wordpress' SERV='' FAVICON='http://aloa-informatique.com/wp-content/themes/aloaTemplate/images/aloa-informatique-logo.png' curl https://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV&favicon=$FAVICON"
